title: Rivera Replacements, Why haven't the Cowboys fired Garrett? (Football 12/4)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Brady Quinn and Ryan Wilson to react to the Panthers' firing of Ron Rivera (2:20) and what's next for Cam Newton and Carolina. The guys also discuss why the Cowboys haven't fired Jason Garrett yet (14:30), take a look at the 2020 NFL Draft (27:00) and answer 5-star questions from Apple Podcasts (48:30). 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
